courses.title: Introduction to Programming
courses.description: This course is designed for those who are just beginning their journey into the world of programming. It covers fundamental concepts and provides hands-on experience with coding. The course consists of 12 lessons with a total duration of 8 hours. Tags: Programming, Beginner.

comments.text: Excellent course! Highly recommend!
A bit challenging, but interesting.

courses.title: Fundamentals of Web Development
courses.description: Master the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This comprehensive course comprises 20 lessons, spanning a total of 16 hours. Tags: Web, Development.

comments.text: Fantastic course! Valuable materials.
Excellent examples of web design in the lessons.

courses.title: Mobile Development
courses.description: Learn the basics of mobile development and create your first mobile application. The course consists of 15 lessons with a total duration of 12 hours. Tags: Mobile, App.

comments.text: Excellent course for beginner mobile developers.
Fascinating insight into creating your own applications!

courses.title: Algorithms and Data Structures
courses.description: Take a deep dive into the world of algorithms and data structures for efficient programming. The course consists of 18 lessons with a total duration of 14 hours. Tags: Programming, Algorithm.

comments.text: Excellent course for those looking to delve into algorithms.
Interesting problems, enjoyed it!

courses.title: Web Interface Development
courses.description: Create beautiful and responsive web interfaces using modern technologies. The course comprises 25 lessons with a total duration of 20 hours. Tags: Web, Frontend.

comments.text: Excellent course on web design and development!
Useful tips for creating user interfaces.

courses.title: Android Mobile App Development
courses.description: Learn to create mobile applications for Android using Java or Kotlin. The course consists of 22 lessons with a total duration of 18 hours. Tags: Mobile, Android.

comments.text: Excellent course for Android developers!
Interesting introduction to the Kotlin language.

courses.title: Databases: Fundamentals and Design
courses.description: Learn the basics of databases and how to design efficient database systems. The course consists of 16 lessons with a total duration of 10 hours. Tags: Database, Design.

comments.text: Valuable knowledge on designing databases.
Good introductory course to SQL.

courses.title: Network Programming
courses.description: Immerse yourself in the world of network programming and learn to create distributed systems. The course consists of 20 lessons with a total duration of 15 hours. Tags: Network, Programming.

comments.text: Excellent course on network programming!
Interesting projects for practical application.

courses.title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning
courses.description: Learn the basics of artificial intelligence and machine learning technologies. The course consists of 24 lessons with a total duration of 22 hours. Tags: AI, Machine Learning.

comments.text: Fantastic introductory course to the world of artificial intelligence!
Useful practical assignments for learning machine learning.

courses.title: Advanced Web Development: Frameworks and Technologies
courses.description: Deepen your knowledge of web development using modern frameworks and technologies. The course consists of 30 lessons with a total duration of 25 hours. Tags: Web, Advanced, Frameworks.

comments.text: Excellent course for experienced web developers!
Informative materials on modern frameworks.
